amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit Export-Import Bank assistance to state-sponsors of terrorism.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in Part B of House Report 114-326 to the Senate amendment to the text to prohibit Export-Import Bank assistance to state-sponsors of terrorism.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A080) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 244 (Roll no. 614).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A080) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 244 (Roll no. 614).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A080) offered by Mr. Royce.
